const Item = ({movie}) => { return(
handleIdSearch(data.id, data.name? "tv":'movie' ) }>

{data.name ? `${data.name} (${data.original_name})`: `${data.title} (${data.original_title})` }

{data.first_air_date ? dateNormalization(data.first_air_date) : dateNormalization(data.release_date)}

{data.vote_average}%

handleIdSearch(data.id, data.name? "tv":'movie' ) }>Leer Mas...
) } export default Item
